title: House for Sale in Indigolla,Yakkala
details:
House available for Sale in Sirimal Uyana Indigolla Yakkala, Built on 20 Perches Land area. Very convenient location close to Gampaha – Yakkala road

The House with, 03 bedrooms, 01 bathrooms, TV lobby, living, dining room , Kitchen, Garden and Separate Annex
Telephone, Electricity, Well & Tap water and other necessary facilities are available.
Close to all Leading Banks, Super Markets, Church, Temple. Financial Institutions, Government & International Schools, Government & International Hospitals, and Good residential area with all conveniences.
Price is negotiable for any serious buyer after the inspection
